Namespace OpenAI_API.Completions

Classes

Choice

Represents a completion choice returned by the Completion API.

CompletionEndpoint

Text generation is the core function of the API. You give the API a prompt, and it generates a completion. The way you “program” the API to do a task is by simply describing the task in plain english or providing a few written examples. This simple approach works for a wide range of use cases, including summarization, translation, grammar correction, question answering, chatbots, composing emails, and much more (see the prompt library for inspiration).

CompletionRequest

Represents a request to the Completions API. Mostly matches the parameters in the OpenAI docs, although some have been renamed or expanded into single/multiple properties for ease of use.

CompletionResult

Represents a result from calling the Completion API

CompletionUsage

API usage as reported by the OpenAI API for this request

Logprobs

Interfaces

ICompletionEndpoint

An interface for CompletionEndpoint, for ease of mock testing, etc
